name: Crash Course (Kyle Tiley, Thando, Funzani)
description:
Crash Course is a 1-Button Arcade driving game, can you avoid crashing for as long as possible?

Press SPACE to turn

Coding - Kyle Tiley
3D Modelling - Funzani Nekhumbe, Thando Maqetuka & Willem White
UI Art - Willem White
Music - Kuhle Msibi
Concept Art - Kamogelo
Sound Effect - https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/explosion/

Made in 60 hours for the first Vega Pretoria Custom Game Jam with the theme of "One Button Game"
